actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 312 of title 38, United States Code, by providing a two-year presumptive period of service connection for the psychoses which develop within two years from the date of separation from active service.

summary.text: Creates a presumption of service-connection for disability compensation purposes for a veteran developing a psychosis to at least a ten percent degree of disability within two years of separation from service during a period of war.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 312 of title 38, United States Code, by providing a two-year presumptive period of service connection for the psychoses which develop within two years from the date of separation from active service.
